reg:regulation.reg:title:
Oath of Office for
British Columbia Teachers' Council
Members and Panel Members Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The following oath is prescribed for the purposes of sections 11, 57 (4) and 73 (4) of the Teachers Act, S.B.C. 2011, c. 19:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: I do swear / solemnly affirm [circle one] that, in the exercise of my powers and the performance of my duties as a member of the British Columbia Teachers' Council or as a panel member:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: • I will abide by the Teachers Act and act in accordance with the law and the public trust placed in me;
• I will safeguard confidential information, not divulging it unless I am either authorized to do so or required to do so by law;
• I will base my decisions on the objective evidence that is available to me;

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: So help me God. [omit this phrase in an affirmation]

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Signature of Council Member / Panel Member

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Teachers Act, S.B.C. 2011, c. 19, sections 11, 57 (4), 73 (4) and 83 (2) (b)]
